meanings.definition: A large wild ox native to Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: Gaurs are majestic creatures roaming the forests.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of gaurs grazing in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The gaur family picnic in the jungle was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of trees, the gaurs stood out like kings of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The gaur's powerful presence left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'gaur'.
meanings.sent1: We observed many gaurs during our wildlife expedition.
meanings.sent2: The zookeepers fed the gaurs their favorite treats.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to see the gaurs at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with gaurs, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The gaurs' thunderous hooves echoed through the valley.
